Articles.Content: I have seen many people say CKAN is better for mods than manual( I personally love MM's) but currently have many parts of my major minmus base operation using modded part and am worried that they'll break. Do you guys have a solution.

Moved over to General Add-on Affairs.

There should be no substantial difference between a mod installed manually and a mod installed by CKAN. If there is, something is wrong with CKAN's metadata for that mod.
